unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: Contribute to Test Statistic
question_text: Suppose Kathy bought a large bag of candy that comes in four flavors: cherry, strawberry, orange, and lemon. Out of the $84\text{ pieces of candy}$ , $23$ were cherry, $24$ were strawberry, $21$ were orange, and $16$ were lemon. Kathy performed a chi-squared goodness of fit test to determine if the candy flavors were evenly distributed. What flavor contributed the most to the chi-squared test statistic?
